name: PsychosocialDistressThermometer
title: Psychosocial Distress Thermometer
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The Psychosocial Distress Thermometer is a clinically validated instrument from the NCCN which, using a likert scale, assessing the degree by which distress interferes with practical, emotional, or family problems),(Data Element Scope: Maps to the Assessment category of the QDM.),(Inclusion Criteria: Assessment via the NCCN Distress thermometer only),(Exclusion Criteria: Evaluation by any other instrument)

concept.display: NCCN Guidelines Distress Management Distress Thermometer Screening Tool Version 1.2011

contains.display: NCCN Guidelines Distress Management Distress Thermometer Screening Tool Version 1.2011
